summary: All five requirements are implemented in the diff. REQ-1 is satisfied by the solid #7B2FFF background in Landing.tsx and index.css. REQ-2 is addressed by the enhanced ContinuousRotatingBlob with iridescent morphing blob and multicolor lights. REQ-3 is implemented via the large bold white 'FitVerse' headline with Syne font at display size overlapping the blob. REQ-4 is covered by the top nav with brand name left and multiple links right in white. REQ-5 is fulfilled by CircularTextBadge with rotating SVG text and sparkle icon. No significant missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
